Author: LyiaEylia
Text: Same boat. I eat okay I guess, but I compulsively exercise to make sure I don’t actually gain the few lbs back that I should to be in a more normal range. I’m so afraid of gaining. I’m slightly under, nothing like when before I went to treatment, but I’m still slightly under and terrified to gain any more. I like myself at this weight, but I know it’s not great for me.
